FAQ

  1. What exactly is Chimera?

    Chimera is the annual technical festival of Department of Computer Science, Ashoka. The fest blends a plethora of events including coding, quizzes, gaming, debates and a lot more events, it has something in store for everyone. It is entirely organised by the ASHOKA student body. To know more about it, please visit our about page.

  2. When is Chimera 2024 scheduled?

    Chimera 2024 will be organized in the Department of Computer Science, Ashoka on 30th to 31th March, 2024. Some events will be taking place before the fest as well. Please checkout our events page for more details.

  3. Who can participate?

    Chimera is a blend of technical as well as non-technical events. Go through the events list to find your pick.

  4. Can I get a schedule of all the events to be held at Chimera 2024?

    Yes, you can find a list of all the events at our events page with detailed description.

  5. Will non-Computer Science students be able to participate in the non-tech events?

    Yes, you are more than welcome to participate in non-tech events. They are open to all, doesn't matter if your background is CS or not.

  6. Is there online registration for events?

    Yes, you need to get registered online in order to participate in the events of Chimera. You can register in different events form here.

  7. How should I reach Department of Computer Science?

    Get directions on Google Maps.
    If you're coming from distance, reaching GTB Nagar Metro Station or Vishwavidyalaya Metro Station and then taking an e-rickshaw might be a good option for you.
    If you've trouble finding the venue location, you may look for following landmarks: Daulat Ram College, Shri Ram College or Faculty of Mathematical Sciences/Social Sciences.

  8. I have a question that was not answered here. What do I do?

    You can drop your queries at ieee.asb@ashoka.edu.in.
    You can also send a message on our Facebook page:
    We have also provided event specific details and contacts on their respective pages.
